com.planetbiru.pushserver.utility

Class ProcessKiller

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.planetbiru.pushserver.utility.ProcessKiller

  • public class ProcessKiller
extends java.lang.Object
    Process killer to kill current service. On Windows, it will kill Java. On Linux, it will kill only process with same image name.
    Author:
    Kamshory, MT
